Package com.github.siroshun09.messages.api.localize

Class AbstractLocalization<T,M extends MessageSource<T>,FB extends FallingBackMessageSource<T,M>>

java.lang.Object
com.github.siroshun09.messages.api.localize.AbstractLocalization<T,M,FB>
Type Parameters:
T - the message type
M - the message source type
FB - the fallback source type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Localization<T,M,FB>
Direct Known Subclasses:
LegacyFormatLocalization, MiniMessageLocalization
public abstract class AbstractLocalization<T,M extends MessageSource<T>,FB extends FallingBackMessageSource<T,M>> extends Object implements Localization<T,M,FB>
An abstract implementation of Localization.
